obj.script:
-- This is a simple example for the player script -- By Christian Clavet, for the IRB project -- Implemented regenerative health in LUA, and a "DEAD" screen and game restart in multiple languages
-- Init the variables scope tx_continue = "" tx_lose = ""
function die() showBlackScreen(tx_lose) sleep(0.5) showDialogQuestion(tx_continue) end
function setStrings() -- Using the "getLanguage" command, we can get international strings in our game! -- text by default is english tx_continue = "Do you want to continue the game?" tx_lose = "YOU LOSE!"
-- Support for Portugese if (getLanguage()=='pt-br') then tx_continue = "Voce quer continuar o jogo?" tx_lose = "VOCE PERDEU!" end
-- Support for French if (getLanguage()=='fr-ca') then tx_continue = "Voulez-vous continuer le jeu?" tx_lose = "VOUS PERDEZ!" end
-- Support for German if (getLanguage()=='de-ge') then tx_continue = "Wollen Sie das Spiel fortsetzen?" tx_lose = "SIE VERLIENREN!" end end
function regen() increasePlayerLife(getPropertie("regenlife")) regentoggle=false end
function onAnswer() -- This happen when the question get answered -- There is not a stop game lua command atm, so answering no will ask the question again if (getAnswer() == true) then hideBlackScreen() setPlayerLife(100) setAnimation("prespawn") end dietoggle=false end
function onLoad() setSkydomeVisible(true) --Display or not the skydome setPlayerLife(100) regentoggle=false dietoggle=false setStrings() end
function onUpdate() if ( getPlayerLife() < getPropertie("maxlife") and regentoggle==false) then programAction(5,regen) regentoggle=true end if ( getPlayerLife() == 0 and dietoggle==false) then playSound("you_lose.mp3",false) programAction(3,die) dietoggle=true end end

local a = 0 local b = 0
function hitplayer() decreasePlayerLife(1) a = 0 end
function step() life = getObjectLife(objName); if (life == 0) then setEnabled(false) end local x,y,z = getObjectPosition("player") if(distanceFrom(x,y,z) < 1.5) then setObjectLabel("Frog life:"..life.."/100") showObjectLabel() if(distanceFrom(x,y,z) < 0.6) then if (a==0)then setFrameLoop(0,0) programAction(0.5, hitplayer) a = 1 b = 0 end else if (b==0) then setAnimation("walk") b=1 end chaseObject("player",0.01,0.5,2) end else hideObjectLabel() walkRandomly() end end
function onLoad() setEnemy() setObjectLife(objName,100); setAnimation("walk") end
function onClicked() end

local a = 0
function setProperties() -- Using the new properties attributes, can set the NPC combat attributes. setEnemy() -- this is an ennemy setPropertie("life",25) -- current life of the NPC setPropertie("maxlife",25) -- current Maximum life of this NPC setPropertie("experience",10) -- given experience to attacker if killed setPropertie("mindamage",1) -- minimum damage inflicted setPropertie("maxdamage",2) -- maximum damage inflicted setPropertie("hurtresist",50) -- resistance to attacks in %. If obtained, trigger the "hurt" animation then return to idle, breaking the current attack setPropertie("hit_prob",50) setPropertie("dodge_prob",12) end
-- "onClicked" will trigger is the dynamic object is being clicked on by the user function onClicked() print("Lua character is being clicked on!") end
-- new game function -- "onCollision" will trigger if the dynamic object got a collision with something function onCollision() end
-- "step" will trigger at each time interval (around 1/4 second) function onUpdate() name = getName()..": "..getPropertie("life").."/"..getPropertie("maxlife") if (getPropertie("life") == 0) then setEnabled(false) return end local x,y,z = getObjectPosition("player") if(distanceFrom(x,y,z) < 288) then setObjectLabel(name) showObjectLabel() if(distanceFrom(x,y,z) < 66) then setAnimation("attack") else chaseObject("player",0.8,66,800) end else hideObjectLabel() walkRandomly() end end
-- "onLoad" will trigger when the dynamic object is initialized (only once) function onLoad() setProperties() blocked = false end

--playSound3D("bell.wav",true,7,3,9) --playSound2D("bell.wav",true)
--playSound("bell.wav",true)
function onLoad() --emitSound("bell.wav",true) --playSound("bell.wav",true) setObjectType("interactive") end
function delay(delayTime) targetTime = os.clock() + delayTime while os.clock() < targetTime do end end
function onClicked() showBlackScreen("teste") sleep(0.5) hideBlackScreen() end

function onClicked() showDialogMessage("Nham Nham..") end
function onLoad() setObjectName("horse_food") setObjectType("interactive") end

local walkmode=false local dialog = false local dialog1 = true local dialog2 = false local dialog3 = false local question = false
function onClicked() if (dialog == false) then showDialogMessage("Hello i'm the wizard!") dialog=true end end
function onAnswer() -- The magician ask to follow him as the player answered that he want to see magic if (dialog2) then showDialogMessage("Follow me..") dialog2=false dialog=false walkmode=true end -- The question was answered if (question) then answer=getAnswer() question=false
if (answer == true) then showDialogMessage("Great! Let's start right now!") dialog2=true walkmode=true else showDialogMessage("Regrettable!") dialog=false end end -- The question is spoken by the mage, awaiting answer if (dialog1) then showDialogQuestion("Do you like to learn magic?") question=true dialog1=false end
end
function onUpdate() if (walkmode ) then walkTo( getObjectPosition("horse_food") ) end end

-- Here are all the dialogue states local message1=true local umbrella=false local question=false local thanks=false local lastmessage=false
-- This is triggered when we click on this character, will display a dialog and wait for a feedback from the user function onClicked() if (message1) then showDialogMessage("Hey Borges!","hey_borges.ogg") end end
-- This is triggered when the user respond to the dialog function onAnswer()
if (lastmessage) then showDialogMessage("You've received an umbrella, check your items bag.") thanks=false lastmessage=false end
if (thanks) then answer = getAnswer() if (answer) then showDialogMessage("Thanks man!","thanks.ogg") addPlayerItem("umbrella") lastmessage=true end end
if (umbrella) then showDialogQuestion("Do you want an umbrella?","umbrella.ogg") umbrella=false thanks=true end
if (message1) then showDialogMessage("Hey Andres!","hey_andres.ogg") umbrella=true message1=false end end

function onLoad() setObjectName("way5") setPlayerLife(100) setObjectLabel(">> click me to lose 1 point of life <<") showObjectLabel() setObjectType("interactive") end
function step() --move this to playerScript
end
function onClicked() print("way5 clicked") decreasePlayerLife(1) print(getPlayerLife()) if (getPlayerLife() == 0) then showBlackScreen("YOU LOSE!") sleep(0.5) hideBlackScreen() end end

-- This is a simple example for the player script -- By Christian Clavet, for the IRB project -- Implemented regenerative health in LUA, and a "DEAD" screen and game restart in multiple languages
-- Init the variables scope tx_continue = "" tx_lose = ""
function die() showBlackScreen(tx_lose) sleep(0.5) showDialogQuestion(tx_continue) end
function setStrings() -- Using the "getLanguage" command, we can get international strings in our game! -- text by default is english tx_continue = "Do you want to continue the game?" tx_lose = "YOU LOSE!"
-- Support for Portugese if (getLanguage()=='pt-br') then tx_continue = "Voce quer continuar o jogo?" tx_lose = "VOCE PERDEU!" end
-- Support for French if (getLanguage()=='fr-ca') then tx_continue = "Voulez-vous continuer le jeu?" tx_lose = "VOUS PERDEZ!" end
-- Support for German if (getLanguage()=='de-ge') then tx_continue = "Wollen Sie das Spiel fortsetzen?" tx_lose = "SIE VERLIENREN!" end end
function regen() increasePlayerLife(getPropertie("regenlife")) regentoggle=false end
function onAnswer() -- This happen when the question get answered -- There is not a stop game lua command atm, so answering no will ask the question again if (getAnswer() == true) then hideBlackScreen() setPlayerLife(100) setAnimation("prespawn") end dietoggle=false end
function onLoad() setSkydomeVisible(true) --Display or not the skydome setPlayerLife(100) regentoggle=false dietoggle=false setStrings() end
function onUpdate() if ( getPlayerLife() < getPropertie("maxlife") and regentoggle==false) then programAction(5,regen) regentoggle=true end if ( getPlayerLife() == 0 and dietoggle==false) then playSound("you_lose.mp3",false) programAction(3,die) dietoggle=true end end

global_script.script:
setTimeOfDay(21)
function umbrella() print("Item umbrella used (add your code here)") removePlayerItem("umbrella") end
